CaseStructure Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node»Structure»MultiFrameStructure. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Case Insensitive MatchSpecifies whether this Case structure performs case insensitive matching when comparing strings. Details
Default CaseSpecifies the default case of the Case structure. Details
Frame NamesGets or sets the name of the frame of the Case structure. Details
SelectorReturns a reference to the case selector of the Case structure. Details
